title: T206 Starter 17 Card Lot Including Addie Joss Portrait
author: ATP

posts.post_title: T206 Starter 17 Card Lot Including Addie Joss Portrait
posts.post_content: Nice starter lot of 17 T206 cards if you are thinking about tackling The Monster, or looking to add to it.  A nice, diverse mix of cards including some different backs, and one Hall of Famer, Addie Joss Portrait (skinned).  Different backs including Polar Bear, Sovereign, Piedmont, two different Sweet Caporal, Old Mill, and even one with a Nelson Tisdel stamp.  Moved to eBay....... delivered for the whole lot, will include a free pack of tobacco size top loaders.
